data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Côtes-d‘Armor, Bretagne, France to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Côtes-d‘Armor, Bretagne, France

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Côtes-d'Armor to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Côtes-d'Armor.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Côtes-d‘Armor, Bretagne, France.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Lannion
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Lannion, Bretagne, France.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Côtes-d‘Armor, Bretagne, France.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Côtes-d‘Armor, Bretagne, France.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.section_summary:
the county of Côtes-d‘Armor, Bretagne, France has a population of 608,400.

We estimate Côtes-d'Armor has 7,476 people who might know Jesus, 372,049 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 228,876 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Côtes-d‘Armor, Bretagne, France to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.
